column1: '''Eglarest''' was the southern of the two [[Havens of the Falas]] that lay at the mouth of the River [[Nenning]] on the western coasts of [[Beleriand]]. The northern haven was called [[Brithombar]].<ref>{{S
column2: Map}}</ref> They were founded during the [[Years of the Trees]] by [[CÃ­rdan]]. Upon the cape west of Eglarest [[Finrod]] had built [[Barad Nimras]].<ref>{{S
column3: 14}}</ref> The Havens lasted until they were taken by [[Morgoth]] in {{FA

column1: It has been suggested that the name means "Ravine of the [[Eglath
